name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
categoryPath: Auto & Tires/Motor Oil, Transmission Fluid & Car Lubricant/Motor Oil

reviews.name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Royal Purple oil for my cars, and do see a slight increase in MPG, and performance. If you looking to give your engine some TLC and look for better performance, try this! Doesn't matter if you have over 75K Miles on your car, just as long as your car has been well taken care of and, changed your oil on the Scheduled times, this will work with your car.
reviews.title: Great bang for the Buck!

reviews.name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
reviews.reviewText: my first time using this product, I noticed a huge difference in the sound of the engine and the power
reviews.title: better gas mileage along with power

reviews.name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
reviews.reviewText: Do research for articles on RP's synerlec. I trust it to protect all my toys regardless of size.
reviews.title: Always find an excuse to use more RP products

reviews.name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
reviews.reviewText: I drive a 2000 Audi A8. I have used Mobile 1 and Lubro Moly, after switching to Royal Purple I no longer have dry start knock after days of just sitting that was present while using the others. I love this oil. Thanks to Cody Bartkowiak from tech support for the quick answers to my questions.
reviews.title: Great Product

reviews.name: Royal Purple 5W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 5 qt
reviews.reviewText: I use Royal purple in my daily driver an 08 Scion tc. I also use it in my truck a 93 f150. The f150 is currently at 300,000 on the odometer and runs like a gem! While gas mileage gains would be silly to speculate, I can tell you that every motor I've ran Royal purple in has experienced a longer than expected oil life. I'm a fan for life.
reviews.title: You won't find a better oil
